oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mathematics of the Genome
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rajapakse, Indika
Smale, Steve
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
Quantitative Biology - Molecular Networks
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This work gives a mathematical foundation for bifurcation from a stable equilibrium in the genome. We construct idealized dynamics associated with the genome. For this dynamics we investigate the two main bifurcations from a stable equilibrium. Finally, we give a mathematical framework for the Repressilator and the Toggle gene circuits.
